Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2309 affecting package python-lxml for versions less than 4.9.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2309 affecting package python-lxml for versions less than 4.9.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-lxml is earlier than 4.9.1-1, affected by CVE-2022-2309
